body_html: I checked it on a system "Linux f9b14d7ac714 4.4.0-75-generic #96-Ubuntu SMP Thu Apr 20 09:55:30 UTC 2017 ppc64le ppc64le ppc64le GNU/Linux" with tensorflow 1.1.0 and quit() didn't give segmentation fault. Could you please try upgrading Tensorflow to 1.1.0 (final release)?
